title: FS: T205 Al Bridwell PSA/DNA 8 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Al Bridwell PSA/DNA 8 SOLD
posts.post_content:
I bought this from a fellow board member, but it's time I move it to fund another purchase of course! The card is tough and graded a 1 but the signature on the back is nice and graded an 8. The price is SOLD delivered PayPal friends/family. Thank you for checking out my sale.

Joe K
